changeSet.author: BOB
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_expense_type_subscription ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, expense_type BIGINT, user_id BIGINT, subscription_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(255), created_by VARCHAR(50), updated_by VARCHAR(50), created_date TIMESTAMP, updated_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (expense_type) REFERENCES expense_type(id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES expense_users(id), CONSTRAINT user_expense_type_subscription_unique UNIQUE (expense_type, user_id, subscription_id) );
